mapper.sql: id, did, stid, stime, etime, splace, eplace,sum, eid, status, checked, paystatus,date,remark
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm where status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.checked=0 and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.checked=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.status=0 and t.checked=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm where status=0 and checked=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.checked!=0 and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.checked!=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.status=0 and t.checked!=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm where status=0 and checked!=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.checked=1 and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.checked=1

limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm where status=0 and checked=1

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.checked>1 and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and t.checked>1

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.status=0 and t.checked>1 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from travel_rbsm where status=0 and checked>1

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by date desc

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from travel_rbsm t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.stid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.did=#{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by date desc
mapper.insert: insert into travel_rbsm (id, did, stid, stime, etime, splace, eplace, sum, eid, status, checked, paystatus,date,remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into travel_rbsm
id,
did,
stid,
stime,
etime,
splace,
eplace,
sum,
eid,
status,
checked,
paystatus,
date,
remark,

mapper.update:
update travel_rbsm
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
splace = #{splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eplace = #{eplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update travel_rbsm set did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, splace = #{splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eplace = #{eplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
